name: barchart-ondemand-market-data-api
description: Barchart OnDemand API service has access to 15-minute delayed market data for BATS (US equities) and global Forex pairs, and end-of-day (including historical) market data for US equities from AMEX, NASDAQ, NYSE and futures from CBOT, CME, COMEX and NYMEX. This package gives a set of wrapper functions to make and manage the http requests for you. All you need to provide is an API key you get from Barchart
author: Joshua Kon <joshuapkon@gmail.com>
